apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a loving couple, with the woman on the left and a person with medium-dark skin tone on the right, connected by a vibrant red heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the figures with a gentle glow, highlighting their soft, rounded forms. The heart itself is rendered with a smooth gradient and realistic lighting, projecting warmth and affection, making it a beautiful symbol of romance and partnership in digital conversations.
